data.lyric:
[ti:Streets (Explicit)]
[ar:Doja Cat]
[al:Hot Pink (Explicit)]
[by:]

[00:00.00]Streets (Explicit) - Doja Cat
[00:00.27]Lyrics by：Amala Zandile Dlamini/Dominique Logan/Darius Logan/Ron Feemster/Omari Grandberry/Demarie Sheki/Christopher Jefferies
[00:00.54]Composed by：Amala Zandile Dlamini/Dominique Logan/Darius Logan/Ron Feemster/Omari Grandberry/Demarie Sheki/Christopher Jefferies
[00:00.81]I've been goin' through some things
[00:03.21]Oh
[00:03.40]I struggle with my inner man
[00:05.31]Yeah yeah
[00:06.17]I hustle I'll do what I can to get this money
[00:09.21]Blaq Tuxedo
[00:09.64]Don Dada on the Don Dada on the beat
[00:31.84]Like you like you
[00:37.06]Like you ooh
[00:39.87]I found it hard to find someone like you
[00:45.04]Like you like you
[00:50.75]Send your location come through
[00:53.54]I can't sleep no more
[00:55.73]In my head we belong
[00:58.37]And I can't be without you
[01:01.44]Why can't I find no one like you
[01:04.21]I can't sleep no more
[01:06.41]In my head we belong
[01:08.98]And I can't be without you
[01:12.16]Why can't I find no one like you
[01:15.49]Baby we tried to fight it
[01:18.05]We all been there some days
[01:20.74]Thought I needed something else
[01:22.70]And acted like I was okay
[01:26.05]We just had to work it out
[01:28.65]And baby I needed space
[01:31.36]Ain't nobody 'round here on your level
[01:34.04]You're so far away
[01:37.25]You're pouring your heart out
[01:39.86]I'm acting like I knew
[01:42.75]You held me so down
[01:45.13]So down I never grew oh
[01:48.09]I tried to find out
[01:50.45]When none of them came through
[01:53.06]And now I'm stuck in the middle
[01:54.55]And baby had to pull me out oh
[01:57.06]Like you like you
[02:02.42]Like you ooh
[02:05.26]I found it hard to find someone like you
[02:10.43]Like you like you
[02:16.09]Send your location come through
[02:18.53]Yeah
[02:19.22]D**n papa you a rare breed no comparing
[02:22.42]And it's motherf**kin' scary
[02:24.45]Tryna keep him 'cause I found him
[02:26.46]Let a ho know I ain't motherf**kin' sharing
[02:29.87]I could take you to the parents then to Paris
[02:33.08]Plan a motherf**kin' wedding
[02:35.09]You the type I wanna marry
[02:36.37]Yeah
[02:36.94]And keep you merry
[02:38.26]I'll put the ring on when you ready
[02:40.16]We play our fantasies out in real life ways and
[02:42.66]No Final Fantasy can we end these games though
[02:45.41]You give me energy make me feel lightweight
[02:47.53]Woo
[02:47.77]Like the birds of a feather baby
[02:49.13]Woo
[02:49.27]We real life made for each other
[02:50.98]Woo
[02:51.18]And it's hard to keep my cool
[02:53.32]When other b***hes tryna get with my dude and
[02:55.98]When other chickens tryna get in my coop
[02:58.47]'Cause you're a one in a million
[02:59.60]There ain't no man like you
[03:01.26]Like you like you
[03:06.38]Like you ooh
[03:09.20]I found it hard to find someone like you
[03:14.38]Like you like you
[03:20.08]Send your location come through
[03:23.17]I can't sleep no more
[03:25.08]In my head we belong
[03:27.72]And I can't be without you
[03:30.77]Why can't I find no one like you
[03:33.52]I can't sleep no more
[03:35.75]In my head we belong
[03:38.42]And I can't be without you
[03:41.38]Why can't I find no one like you
data.trans:
[ti:Streets (Explicit)]
[ar:Doja Cat]
[al:Hot Pink (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.27]//
[00:00.54]//
[00:00.81]一直以来 我经历着许多事情
[00:03.21]//
[00:03.40]内心挣扎
[00:05.31]//
[00:06.17]奔波劳碌 我会为这笔钱尽我所能
[00:09.21]//
[00:09.64]Don和Dada参与制作
[00:31.84]如你一般的人
[00:37.06]如你一般的人
[00:39.87]我很难再找到如你一般的人
[00:45.04]如你一般的人
[00:50.75]把你的位置发送过来
[00:53.54]我难以入睡
[00:55.73]在我的幻想中 我们仍属于彼此
[00:58.37]我不能没有你
[01:01.44]为何难以再找如你一般的人
[01:04.21]我难以入睡
[01:06.41]在我的幻想中 我们仍属于彼此
[01:08.98]我不能没有你
[01:12.16]为何难以再找如你一般的人
[01:15.49]宝贝我们曾试图与现状抗争
[01:18.05]那些日子我们都经历过
[01:20.74]我想我得想些其他办法
[01:22.70]虽然表现得若无其事
[01:26.05]但我们必须解决问题
[01:28.65]宝贝我需要空间
[01:31.36]没有人像你一样
[01:34.04]你离我如此遥远
[01:37.25]你对我付出真心
[01:39.86]我假装我已了解
[01:42.75]你让我如此沮丧
[01:45.13]从未有过的伤心
[01:48.09]试图寻找答案
[01:50.45]却毫无头绪
[01:53.06]现在我进退两难
[01:54.55]宝贝把我从痛苦中拉出来
[01:57.06]如你一般的人
[02:02.42]如你一般的人
[02:05.26]我很难再找到如你一般的人
[02:10.43]如你一般的人
[02:16.09]把你的位置发送过来
[02:18.53]//
[02:19.22]你就像稀世珍宝 无与伦比
[02:22.42]这令人害怕
[02:24.45]想留住他 因为我遇到了他
[02:26.46]让他知道 我不想与人分享
[02:29.87]我可以带你去见父母 然后我们去巴黎
[02:33.08]策划一场婚礼
[02:35.09]你就是我想嫁的人
[02:36.37]//
[02:36.94]我会让你感到幸福
[02:38.26]你准备好了我就给你戴上戒指
[02:40.16]在我们日常生活里实现所有浪漫
[02:42.66]要是没有最终幻想 那我们能结束这场游戏吗
[02:45.41]你给了我能量 让我觉得一身轻松
[02:47.53]//
[02:47.77]宝贝 物以类聚 人以群分
[02:49.13]//
[02:49.27]我们天生一对
[02:50.98]//
[02:51.18]让人很难保持冷静
[02:53.32]当其他女人挖我墙角的时候
[02:55.98]当其他女人觊觎我家的时候
[02:58.47]因为你万里挑一
[02:59.60]这世间不存在能和你相提并论的人
[03:01.26]如你一般的人
[03:06.38]如你一般的人
[03:09.20]我很难再找到如你一般的人
[03:14.38]如你一般的人
[03:20.08]把你的位置发送过来
[03:23.17]我难以入睡
[03:25.08]在我的幻想中 我们仍属于彼此
[03:27.72]我不能没有你
[03:30.77]为何难以再找如你一般的人
[03:33.52]我难以入睡
[03:35.75]在我的幻想中 我们仍属于彼此
[03:38.42]我不能没有你
[03:41.38]为何难以再找如你一般的人
